TUTO_2: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's Energy Prices Visualization Tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool.
TUTO_4: The height of these bars represents the prices that customers pay for gas or electricity. By clicking on them, you can further disaggregate them into sub-categories or explore other statistics such as time graphs, pie charts, or bar charts to compare different consumption levels for the selected country.
TUTO_6: In addition to the bar options, the tool contains a menu for additional features. Click on the menu icon to customize the chart. Click next to learn about the menu options.
TUTO_8: Use this option to change the chart to a table format.
TUTO_10: Use this option to change the order of the chart elements.
TUTO_12: Use this option to add or remove aggregates from the chart.
TUTO_14: Use this menu to access the tutorial, metadata, or to send feedback.
TUTO_16: Click here to download an image or data file.
TUTO_18: Use this button to embed the chart in other tools or websites.
TUTO_20: Use this option to change the language of the tool. It supports English, French, and German.
TUTO_22: If you find this visualization tool useful, please show your support by sharing it with others on X, Facebook, email, and LinkedIn. Thank you!
